aircraft.value: Hercules Transport - AC-4561-322 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Weapon station electrical short. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 19/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 21/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 21/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
